prompt: Architecture diagram showing Clawdbot as a central hub connecting to Feishu chat app and multiple AI models (Qwen, GLM, Minimax). Use remote control metaphor - one remote controlling multiple devices. Simple flowchart style with arrows.
Terminal command line interface showing the installation process of Clawdbot. Display command prompt with 'curl' command and progress indicators. Clean, simple terminal window mockup.

Step-by-step installation process visualization. 8 numbered steps from 1 to 8, showing: command input, Yes/No choices, Quick Start selection, model selection, browser authorization, Skip options. Use simple boxes and arrows connecting each step.

Feishu open platform homepage interface mockup. Highlight the 'Create Enterprise App' button in the top right corner. Show simplified navigation menu and main content area. Label in Chinese: 创建企业自建应用.
Feishu app management interface showing left sidebar with 'Bot' menu item highlighted. Arrow pointing to 'Add Bot' button. Show configuration panel area. Simple interface wireframe.

Permissions checklist visualization. 3 checkbox items with names: 1) im:message.group_at_msg (receive group @ messages), 2) im:message.p2p_msg (receive private messages), 3) im:message:send_as_bot (send as bot). Each with a green checkmark. Clean checklist style.
Event subscription interface mockup. Show 'Event Subscription' menu item highlighted, callback URL input box (marked as 'leave empty for now'), and 'Add Event' section below. Simple form layout.

Credentials page interface showing two key pieces of information highlighted: 'App ID' (example: cli_a1b2c3d4e5f6g7h8) and 'App Secret' (with 'Show' button). Use box outlines and arrows to emphasize these two fields.
Clawdbot web management interface mockup. Show left sidebar with 'Channel Management' menu highlighted. Main area shows plugin installation interface. Clean dashboard layout.

Dual interface comparison showing callback URL flow. Left side: Clawdbot interface with webhook URL displayed. Right side: Feishu event subscription page with URL input field. Arrow showing copy-paste action from left to right. Split screen layout.

Feishu chat conversation scene. Show simple chat bubbles: user sends message 'Hello' to bot, bot responds with friendly reply. Use simplified chat interface with message bubbles and simple avatar icons. Cheerful, friendly atmosphere.

Troubleshooting decision tree flowchart. Starting from 'Bot not responding', branching to check points: Check permissions, Check callback URL, Check service running, Check logs. Use simple decision tree with yes/no branches and action boxes.
